articles.title: How Sunita Williams, Stuck In Space, Wished Godspeed To Paris Olympians - NDTV
articles.description: For 52 days and counting, Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams is in limbo at the International Space Station, but in a new video, she is seen celebrating the Olympics spirit in the weightless atmosphere, 400 kilometres above Paris.
